global.no_undoing: This action cannot be undone. Please confirm.
global.browser_alert: To make full use of this website, we recommand Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox. If your conmapy doesn't allow you to install them, think about Microsoft Edge which should already be installed on your computer.

error.unknown: An error occurred. Please try again later.

api.sensor_subscriptions_updated: Unresponding sensors messages subscription successfully saved

period_offsets.year: This year | Last year | {count} years ago

index.title: Dashboard
index.description: View your saved charts and access the functionalities of the Meters website
index.temp_outdated: The latest value was recorded on {time}

admin.title: Administration
admin.description: Manage metadata of this Meters instance
admin.info: Create, edit and delete users. No action can be undone.

infos.title: Information
infos.description: Get information about your account and company on Meters
infos.locale_explain: This language is only used when we send you emails.
infos.sensor_subscriptions: Subscription to unresponding sensors email alerts
infos.sensor_subscriptions_details: If the selected sensors stop sending data, you will recieve an email in the next 15 minutes. No matter your settings, the Naito One Team is always informed of unresponding sensors.

explore.title: Explore data
explore.description: Explore your data in details, download it and save charts to your dashboard

bookmark.title: Add bookmark
bookmark.name: Chart name (optional)
bookmark.explain: The currently configured chart will be added to your dashboard for quick access.
bookmark.relative_period: The choosen relative period will be kept:

form.no_resources: Please select at least one resource to get started

signature.title: Energy signature
signature.description: Track the sensitivity of a building to cold weather and identify heating deviations

form.invalid_query: Please select a site, temperature resource and heater resource to get started

map.title: Resources location
map.description: View the location of your resources on a map

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.description: View, edit and create new objectives on the Meters platform
objectives.info: Recieve weekly or monthly reports of your energy consumption to reach your objectives.

form.missing_resource: Please select a resource to validate the objective
form.not_enough_data: Not enough data to compute the comparison

alerts.title: Alerts
alerts.description: View, edit and create new alerts on the Meters platform
alerts.info: Recieve alerts when your temperature sensors read unusual values.

form.range_note: You won't recieve further alerts until the temperature has gone back to normal.
form.tolerance_note: For how much time must the temperature be outside the range before an alert is sent.

login.new_client: Not a client yet ? Discover meters.ch !
login.title: Login portal of Meters.ch
login.description: Login to the Meters online dashboard using your credentials

form.explain: Enter your email address to receive a reset link.
form.note: If you don't recieve the email, check your SPAM folder.

reset.title: Forgotten password
reset.description: Ask for an email to reset the password of your Meters account

form.explain: Please enter a new password for your account.

fresh.title: New password
fresh.description: Create a new password for your Meters account from a link given to you by email
